level.heading: No creditor rights in trust property.
level.text: A creditor of a beneficial owner or trustee shall not obtain possession of, or otherwise exercise legal or equitable remedies with respect to, the property of a statutory trust or any series thereof.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 305 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
